H0.text: Which heavyweight boxing champion knocked out Max Schmeling in the first round of their re-match at Yankee Stadium in New York City in June 1938. Jack Dempsey

H1.text: Which heavyweight boxing champion knocked out Max Schmeling in the first round of their re-match at Yankee Stadium in New York City in June 1938. Gene Tunney

H2.text: Which heavyweight boxing champion knocked out Max Schmeling in the first round of their re-match at Yankee Stadium in New York City in June 1938. Max Baer

H3.text: Which heavyweight boxing champion knocked out Max Schmeling in the first round of their re-match at Yankee Stadium in New York City in June 1938. Joe Loius

A4.text: Louis battered Schmeling with a series of swift attacks, forcing him against the ropes and giving him a paralyzing body blow... Schmeling was knocked down three times and only managed to throw two punches in the entire bout.

A5.text: The fight lasted two minutes and four seconds... On the third knockdown, Schmeling's trainer threw in the towel and referee Arthur Donovan stopped the fight.
